channel.title: Comments on: Nature Jobs talk on building scientific communities

item.title: By: Top tips for building science communities with social media | Green Tea and Velociraptors
item.dc:creator: Top tips for building science communities with social media | Green Tea and Velociraptors
item.description: […] ago, I was fortunate enough to be asked to give a talk at the Nature Careers Expo in London about how to use social media to build scientific communities. As part of this, there was a short panel discussion afterwards with myself and Sarah Blackford […]
item.content:encoded: […] ago, I was fortunate enough to be asked to give a talk at the Nature Careers Expo in London about how to use social media to  build scientific communities. As part of this, there was a short panel discussion afterwards with myself and Sarah Blackford […]
